channel.title: Creative mind
channel.description:
This series, hosted by Lyman Bryson, presents radio essays about the creative process for the American artist and scientist in the 20th century.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: The composer as creator
item.description: This program features Walter Piston speaking on music composition and creativity.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Composition (Music)

item.title: The composer as creator
item.description: This program features Aaron Copland speaking on music composition and creativity.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Composition (Music)

item.title: The architect as creator
item.description: This program features Frank Lloyd Wright speaking about architecture and creativity.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Architecture.

item.title: The creative personality
item.description: This program features Jacob Bronowski speaking on aspects of the creative personality.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Creative ability.

item.title: The research scientist
item.description: This program features John C. Sheehan speaking on science and creativity.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Creative ability.

item.title: The theoretical scientist
item.description: This program features Harlow Shapley speaking on science and creativity.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Creative ability.

item.title: The painter as creator
item.description: This program features Ben Shahn speaking on painting and creativity.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Creative ability.

item.title: The choreographer as creator
item.description: This program features Agnes de Mille speaking on creativity and choreography.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Choreography.

item.title: The creative mind
item.description: This program features Rudolf Arnheim, Margaret Mead, and Milton Nahm speaking on creativity.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Creative ability.

item.title: The writer as creator
item.description: This program features Robert Penn Warren speaking on writing and creativity.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Writers.

item.title: Man the creator
item.description: This program features guests Milton Nahm, Louis Finkelstein, and Reinhold Niebuhr.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Creative ability.

item.title: The poet as creator
item.description: This program features Allen Tate speaking on poetry and creativity.
item.dc:creator: Summerfield, Jack D.
item.dc:subject: Poetry.
